padding--l-none.title: No left padding
padding--l-none.description: Removes all padding from the left.

padding--l-xs.title: Tiny left padding
padding--l-xs.description: Adds a tiny amount of padding to the left.

padding--l-sm.title: Small left padding
padding--l-sm.description: Adds a small amount of padding to the left.

padding--l-md.title: Medium left padding
padding--l-md.description: Adds a medium amount of padding to the left.

padding--l-lg.title: Large left padding
padding--l-lg.description: Adds a large amount of padding to the left.

padding--l-xl.title: Extra-large left padding
padding--l-xl.description: Adds an extra-large amount of padding to the left.

padding--l-xxl.title: Double-extra-large left padding
padding--l-xxl.description: Adds a double-extra-large amount of padding to the left.
